properties.tweet: First 25km done!   Beautiful scenery and amazing people!  Hurt like crazy and I am dead tired but feeling pretty good nonetheless.  :-)
Four more sleeps until the journey begins! Strength is in the struggle. #camino2014
One week today and I leave for France to do the El Camino with my mom.   950 km in 33 days. http://t.co/XFHydDWy0n
After 30 hours of no sleep, a plane,  a train and a walk,  we finally made it to Arles. Journey begins tomorrow. http://t.co/ckKRe30hiC
Day 2 was a gruelling 32km in the heat.  Pushing my limits!!  My 74 year old mom is schooling me for sure!  :-) http://t.co/TGR0KD0Ica
18km to Vauvert this morning.   We had breakfast along the way.   What a feast! Another 14km to go..... http://t.co/GBGC2y3TIv
With mom and Dad at Krystal's. Celebrating pre-departure! http://t.co/JI72XNgbB9
At Trudeau airport ready to take the flight that almost didn't happen.  Next update from France! Au  Revoir. http://t.co/fgRSswrGIt
